summary: The gateway in front of Whiuterun now has two light sources. one for each brazier.
descriptionHtml:
The first gateway that is in front of whiterun has two braziers. I looked in the CK and found their was only one light source on the right one. I copied the light source on the right and moved it, so it\'s over the left brazier as well.

Manual installation
Extract the esp and drop it in the Skyrim data folder.

NMM installation
Download it to the manager and check the box next to it.
author: bwins95
